snippet: An Oklahoma man has been arrested for allegedly mailing a suspicious package that contained explosives to a sheriff in Arizona last year, authorities said Tuesday....

headline.print_headline: Man Held in Mailing Explosives to Arizona Sheriff
headline.main: Man Held in Mailing Explosives to Arizona Sheriff

lead_paragraph: An Oklahoma man has been arrested for allegedly mailing a suspicious package that contained explosives to a sheriff in Arizona last year, authorities said Tuesday.
